title: Particulate diagram - products of 4 H2 and 4 O2

content.description: A mixture of <math alttext="H 2, gas" overflow="scroll"> <mstyle> <mrow> <msub> <mrow> <mtext>H</mtext> </mrow> <mrow> <mn>2</mn> </mrow> </msub> <mtext>(</mtext> <mi>g</mi> <mtext>)</mtext> </mrow> </mstyle> </math> and <math alttext="O 2, gas" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><msub><mrow><mtext>O</mtext></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msub><mtext>(</mtext><mi>g</mi><mo>)</mo></mrow></mstyle></math> is placed in a container as represented above. The <math alttext="H 2, gas" overflow="scroll"> <mstyle> <mrow> <msub> <mrow> <mtext>H</mtext> </mrow> <mrow> <mn>2</mn> </mrow> </msub> <mtext>(</mtext> <mi>g</mi> <mtext>)</mtext> </mrow> </mstyle> </math> and <math alttext="O 2, gas" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><msub><mrow><mtext>O</mtext></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msub><mtext>(</mtext><mi>g</mi><mo>)</mo></mrow></mstyle></math> react to form <math alttext="H 2, gas" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><msub><mrow><mtext>H</mtext></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msub><mtext>O</mtext><mtext>(</mtext><mi>g</mi><mtext>)</mtext></mrow></mstyle></math>.
content.question: Which of the following best represents the container after the reaction has gone to completion?

choices.label: The figure presents a particle diagram consisting of four H 2 O molecules.
The figure present a particle diagram consisting of four H 2 O molecules and two O 2 molecules.
The figure presents a particle diagram consisting of four H 2 O molecules and four separated O atoms.
The figure presents a particle diagram consisting of eight H 2 O molecules.

content.answer: The figure present a particle diagram consisting of four H 2 O molecules and two O 2 molecules.

skill.text: 5.E: Determine a balanced chemical equation for a given chemical phenomenon.
